data.message:
Dear person reading this,
I hope your day has been going well, if not, I hope it gets better :) You are an amazing person who will inspire others to do great things so keep up the hard work. I know you may feel unimportant or insecure at the moment but know that you are a beautiful human being inside and out and you are important !
Sometimes we just need such a message !
Bye

replies.message: On you thanks for that you must have a heart of gold x
Keep up the good work...motivation and hope is what everyone  needs
thanks a lot Nikola tefov. ... that  was very  touchy msg  .... it felt  good. ..
thanx for doing Such a good thing that surely gonna made happy and rich in heart

To assume someone is ugh..not happy or insecure..is trying to emotionally control them by..its called predecieved notion..I'm sure he's happy what a backwards comment!! All I hope ur doing well then assume the worst..ignorance at its finest!! Pfft why would it..friends say I'm sure ur doing well..you look great!! Not ugh..I think your insecure..flap jacks!!
U tell about it I'm having the worst time everrr can't even breath ;-(
